title: Sync Dashboard State
purpose: Mirror data/state/**/* into docs/state/**/* for GitHub Pages telemetry dashboards.

context.goal: Ensure every agent reads the same repo snapshot, OpenSpec digest, and synced state.

instructions: Recursively copy data/state and data/metrics into docs/state (remove old files first).
Ensure the script is idempotent and preserves directory structure.
When executed on a hosted studio, include the chat URL in your completion for audit.
Return the updated script file inside <FILE> fences.
acceptance_criteria: No stale files remain after sync
handoff_expectations: Include execution.chat_url in the completion so supervisors can audit hosted platform runs.
